name: Pixel Puzzles 4k: Japan
description:
Pixel Puzzles 4k: Japan combines a traditional jigsaw puzzle style gameplay with light video-game interactivity. Build puzzles and attain a higher state of consciousness. All hand drawn in a beautiful Japanese aesthetic, Pixel Puzzles: Japan is perfect for puzzlers and gamers alike.

Features:

  • Traditional puzzle gameplay.
  • Relaxing Japanese atmosphere.
  • 25 puzzles in a range of sizes from 84 to 432 pieces.
  • Beautiful 4k photos taken on site in Japan.
  • Interactive play environment.
